data.actual_result: It's a bit towards the right side.
data.expected_result: The icon is centered in the highlighted box.
data.short_description: The server icon in the box isn't centered in the mutual friends tab in a profile.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the profile of a person you share servers with. - Click on the mutual friends tab. - Long press on any any friend in the tab. - Observe the server icons.
